Text: Re FW SDGEs Surcharge Application Testimony and Motion for an Or der Shortening Time Thanks alot From Jeff NRON on AM Sent by Jeff NRON To Edward ES Chris ES Harry nron cc Subject FW SDGEs Surcharge Application Testimony and Motion for an Or der Shortening Time Forwarded by Jeff DasovichNAEnron on AM JMB MSSRcom AM To cc Subject FW SDGEs Surcharge Application Testimony and Motion for an Or der Shortening Time Here is the SDGE filing Original Message From Ruiz Annie mailto Sent Wednesday January PM To Follett David Melville Keith Parrott Jeff Van Wagenen Lynn Subject SDGEs Surcharge Application Testimony and Motion for an Order Shortening Time Attached is an electronic copy of SDGEs Application Testimony and Motion for an Order Shortening Time filed today with the CPUC Applicationdoc McMonagle Testimondoc Motiondoc Reed Attachmentdoc Reed Testimonydoc Sakarias Testimonydoc Schneider Testdoc Schneider Exhibitsxls Schneider Rate Tablesxls Applicationdoc McMonagle Testimondoc Motiondoc Reed Attachmentdoc Reed Testimonydoc Sakarias Testimonydoc Schneider Testdoc Schneider Exhibitsxls Schneider Rate Tablesxls

NEWS Legislation for cent billCA Senate passed SBX today Forwarded by Edward HambHOUEES on AM James M Wood PM To cc Subject NEWS Legislation for cent bill is it a rate freeze or the rate ceiling Forwarded by James M WoodHOUEES on PM Enron Energy Services From Jennifer Rudolph AM To CA Team cc Subject NEWS Legislation for cent bill from Utility Risk Management Forwarded by Jennifer RudolphHOUEES on AM Tamara Johnson AM I found out late Friday that the bill passed out of the Senate on Thursday and went to the Assembly for a vote By putting a cap on all customers served by SDGE the government is essentially putting customers of all three IOUs on the same footing which allows for a common surcharge to be levied on all the customers The cent ceiling is comparable to the frozen rates of SCE and PGE plus the cent surcharge levied in January Heres the analysis that is put out at the Senate Heres the bill itself Rosalinda Tijerina AM To Tamara ES cc Subject NEWS cent bill passes Senate Forwarded by Rosalinda TijerinaHOUEES on AM From Jeff NRON on PM Sent by Jeff NRON To Alan CT Angela ES Beverly ES Bill ES Brenda ES Carol ES Cathy ES Chris H CT Christina ES Craig H ES Dan ES Debora ES Dennis ES Don ES Dorothy CT Douglas ES Edward NRON Eric ES Erika ES Evan ES Fran ES Gayle W ES Ginger NRON Gordon ES Harold G ES Harry NRON Iris ES James D NRON James W ES James WrightWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange Jeff ES Jeremy ES Jess ES Joe NRON Karen NRON Kathy ES Kathy ES Ken ES Kevin ES Leasa ES Leticia ES Mark S ES Marsha ES Marty ES Meredith M ES Michael CT Michael ES Michelle D CT Neil ES Neil ES Paul CT Paula ES Richard L ES Richard ES Richard NRON Rita NRON Roger ES Rosalinda ES Sandra NRON Sarah NRON Scott ES Scott ES Sharon ES Tanya ES Tasha ES Ted CT Terri NRON Tim CT Tony ES Vicki ES Vladimir CT Wanda ES William S CT Kathryn NRON Jubran ES Richard B CT Robert C WilliamsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Greg CT James WrightWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange Dirk vanUldenWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange Steve ES Jennifer ES Martin ES Douglas ES Scott Govenar Hedy Govenar ENRON Mike D ES John NeslageENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Janel nron Eric ES cc Subject NEWS cent bill passes Senate Forwarded by Jeff DasovichNAEnron on PM Jennifer ES PM To CA Team cc Subject NEWS cent bill passes Senate CA Senate passed SBX today Now the bill goes to the Assembly Looking for article More to come
